New Records: Sunil Chhetri now holds the unique record of scoring at least one goal in his first, 25th, 50th, 75th, 100th, and 125th matches.
Key Match Events: Rahmat Akbari's shot deflected off a defender to find its way past Gurpreet Singh Sandhu in the 70th minute for the equaliser
Sharif Mukhammad dealt the deathly blow by converting a penalty in the 88th minute
Sunil Chhetri gave the Blue Tigers the lead off a penalty kick in the 38th minute
Pre-Game Insights: India desperately needed full points from this encounter to keep alive their hopes of a long and arduous journey to the third round
Post-Match Reflections: India have two more matches in hand, including a crucial away match against Qatar, and a home match against Kuwait on June 6, 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's loss of three points left them with just four points from four matches in the four-team Round 2 group
Afghanistan, too, have four points from as many matches and can definitely aspire to overtake India in the points table
Others: India drew the away match against Afghanistan goalless in Saudi Arabia
India's quest for a place in the third round of the FIFA World Cup 2026 and AFC Asian Cup 2027 Preliminary Joint Qualifiers suffered a serious jolt
